title: Had enough of trolls feeders etc.

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body: Yesterday to today played around 10 games, 6-7 had afkers, dcers, and trollers who just feed. One of them ^ photo shows that garen and ashe just rushed for tower at bot and get killed by ashe. And no, enemy ashe was ridiculously bad, 1 combo from rammus = dead. We only won because of annie and I, and the fact their team was not that great either.... thing im asking is does it get any better the higher level you get? at 20-30 level is there still as many trolls? thanks. PS: if your reading this and youre a troll, piss off! Stop wasting your time. :)

replies.body:
You're lvl 5, at least from the picture.

So you probably want to take into account that there are new players who really don't know any better, high level smurf who are just out to ruin some lives and bots which have infested the low level matchmaking for quite some time already.

Now isn't exactly a good time for any player who is below lvl 20 sadly.

EDIT: Trolls exists anywhere in all levels and all modes, the only difference is mostly that there aren't as many intentional feeders and nearly no bots.

He may be level 5 but it doesn't change in high level games. I'm level 30 and it doesn't change people are people. there a pains out there and it sucks when you get teamed with them but it's all part of the experience
So why aren't we naming and shaming?

It could also not even be a human player. Sites that sell unranked level 30 accounts use their own bots to boost accounts to level 30. Even though they normally play bot games I've heard of cases on NA where they've been playing PVP games.
I have seen bots play better than humans and carry the team. It had 20+ kills consistently and won most bots games.

Before level 30, 1/3 of players are actually computer bots, programmed by players to level up the account without having to play themselves (Not sure if it is allowed or not) another 1/3 of players are actually just beginners like you, some of these are just naturally bad. And another 1/3 of players are actually experienced players playing on what we call "smurfs." These players already have a level 30 account and therefore will be a lot better than all other players. By the looks of it, that Annie might be a smurf (I can tell because she is 26/1, and has a decent build, and has a lot of farm (CS aka minions). By the way, don't build 2 of the same item (such as those two thornmails you built).
Im assuming this is just some troll whos been banned on NA Boards and has come to OCE to continue. Also, not troll.
I just realised this guy is from NA, he probably posted on the wrong forum.

Know what?

How he is from NA? It's after his summoner name. There is a (NA).

> Akihiderain (NA)     submitted about 6 hours ago in Gameplay & Strategy
Most bots play Bot games, Xuanlulu, UR MUM 8ME
Ofc not, no trolls in NA.
